Meet Jayni!

Hi friends, I'm Jayni! Have you met the rest of my family yet? I feel lucky to have them. We help each other and are a great team, but there are times that we argue too. Isn't that what family is all about?

I think of myself as the motivator of the group. I help Billy and Bella study for their tests and help Jax with his research papers. Boy, those can be boring! As an optimist, I see the fun in doing something and believe anything is possible! We always make a game out of doing homework.

Every morning I run 2.5 miles. Then, I drink a delicious healthy smoothie. I have recipes if you want to share!

What's Jayni up to today?

Jayni's Soccer Adventures: Health Lesson 1

Read More
  • More About Jayni
  • Things Jayni Loves
  • Things Jayni Dislikes

When I'm stressed, I listen to music or play the piano. Music seems to calm me down and keep me focused. As a matter of fact, I wrote a poem and now I'm trying to make a song! Some day I hope that I'll be a famous musician.

In the meantime, I'm working on a video related to bullying. My friends and I started this project over the summer. I'm a spokesperson for schools against bullying. How can anyone say it's fair when a kid can't speak up for themselves? It's my mission to help them. After all, I've heard people refer to me as "Super Girl!"

Well, enough about me. I'm excited to hear all about you!

I just love being active and staying healthy. My hobbies are:

  • Listening to music
  • Playing piano
  • Writing poetry and songs
  • Cooking healthy males
  • Reading
  • Exercising
  • Theatre dance
  • Volunteering at the Animal Shelter. (I've been wanting a puppy for so long. I'm hoping my parents will surprise me one day!)

When Springtime comes around, I like to garden. Growing fresh herbs, fruits and vegetables is so rewarding, not to mention yummy!

When Summer is in full swing, I make homemade jams, pies, and soups. I also do a lot of babysitting, when I'm not helping animals find new homes. Traveling is always a big part of our summer. We road trip across the country, meet new people, try new foods, and make scrapbooks of all our memories! I'm constantly hiking and camping.

Lets not forget Fall, the most colorful season of all! The leaves changing colors is nature's beauty at its best, I think. I love carving pumpkins and running through corn mazes!

Winter is my favorite time of year because it's the holiday season! I love the spirit of giving and spending time with family. There's nothing better than reading a good book in front of the fireplace, while sipping a hot chocolate.

  • Snakes.
  • Germs! Germs spread so fast and easily that I'm always afraid of getting sick. My family tells me no to worry so much. Sometimes getting sick, builds a defense against other illnesses.
  • When people don't follow the rules. We all need to get along with each other, so all rules should apply to everyone.

What do you think?

Do you have things that you dislike? What are they?
